wikipedia_page.main: Nathaniel George Philips (1795–1831) was an English painter trained in Edinburgh and member of the Academy of St Luke.

response: Philips married Caroline Renny, and they had five children. The youngest was Nathaniel George Philips.
*Warrington Town Hall (and its golden gates), formerly Bank Hall (built 1750), the home of the Philips family and their scion the artist Nathaniel George Philips
